message: no, pinax was just designed to make it easier to get sites of any kind out quicker
It is  true at the beggining pinax is thinking for make social networks ?
it just so happens that the first *example* we did was a social network
Hello @jtauber, is there "SHARE" function in Pinax? and "NEWS-FEED" function in Pinax?
Is there any plans to build a OpenID / OAuth only site registration / login based pinax? (ie out of the box, no django-registration)
@evilkarlothian you could always remove the django bits from the signup/login templates
@issackelly Yeah, that's what I've been doing. With the range of 'social-auth' apps it would be great to see pinax throw it's support behind one to try and focus efforts on a standard app.
